idea: Venue First is India's leading search engine for discovering and booking unique venues worldwide. Aided by a sound back-end, proven tools and a transformative technology users can find,  compare quotes, and book their ultimate venue from 2000+ handpicked unique venues globally. We help you save time & money, giving you a hassle- free booking experience.
name: VENUEMAVEN PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Brand - www.hostaplay.com


Parent company- www.netsamrat.com


Our Motto- Harnessing the power of live entertainment in creating a positive socio-cultural change and restoring the prestige of live performing art forms by creating innovative contemporary experiences for audiences of all age groups- across cities, towns and rural areas. 


1. Bringing Live Entertainment experiences through Theatre, Music and other performing arts to the audience's doorstep- from Metros to small towns and villages.


2. Generating employment for professional performing artists by creating new opportunities through innovative venues, audience engagement and immersive experiences.


3. Curating Live entertainment right into one's doorstep- from offices, corporate companies, educational institutions, NGOs, social entertainment events and private occasions.


4. Make an organised platform for live performance artists and companies, to manage them, promote them and create an ecosystem- a marketplace for performers, organisers and brands interested in associations with live shows.


5. Reviving and promoting the dying live art forms and converting them into contemporary creative experiences for the audience across age groups and take them to urban, semi-urban and rural regions of India.
name: NETSAMRAT ENTERTAINMENT LLP

idea:
Cherise India Pvt Ltd is a Food and beverage company which is revolutionizing the instant beverages segment with the help of technology. The company produced vending machines using the state of the class technology. 
 
Unlike traditional vending machines its not just a beverage dispensing unit, but a smart and intelligent machine which can offer a wide range of beverages and a unique experience to the end consumer. 
 
The product will be able to dispense the unique Indian tastes of beverages like Gujarati Haldi Doodh, Udipi Filter Coffee, Dilli Adrak Chai, Calcutta Pavapatti Chai, Jaipuri Elichi Chai, Hyderabadi Kesri Chai and Mumbai Masala Chai with a fully automated and intelligent IOT system to manage the supplies.
name: CHERISE (INDIA) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are supplier of Hardware like Desktop, Laptop,All in One , Computer server and computer storage and other IT products
name: TELKO INFO SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Curiosity Gym is a leading Edtech company with the focus on igniting curiosity and innovation in young minds.
Curiosity Gym has been instrumental in setting up Tinkering Labs called Innovation Hubs in leading schools across India from scratch, and have provided the infrastructure including equipment’s,
consumables, staff, and content mapped to curriculum.
Curiosity Gym has been running Tinkering Labs since 2015 and we are the first company to do it as a part of school timetable.
Curiosity Gym’s mission is to transform India’s children and youth and make learning fun for them, to catalyse creative confidence and innovation in them by establishing service products that are best in class in school segment and developing the ability to offer new and upgraded service offerings every year.
The team at Curiosity Gym is a mix of qualified consultants, engineers, physicists, fabricators, linguists, artists & Fab Lab graduates who are innovative, creative, friendly and spirited.
name: CURIOSITY GYM PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Intelligent Payments offers it's mobile wallet with an open loop card as a B2B2C solution in the market.
name: RupEase

idea: Bookmark Holidays llp is a membership based module wherein we offer free stay to our members in various destinations accross India. The booking attracts a minimum utility charge per person per night. We cater to direct members of public and also to companies who wish to gift our membership to their patrons.
name: BOOKMARK HOLIDAYS LLP

idea: Metwiz Materials Private Limited  is a manufacturing sector startup incubated out of IIT Mumbai. Founded by a team of IIT graduates , its  prime objective  is to manufacture and supply customised and standard laboratory equipments with high quality and advanced technology.
name: METWIZ MATERIALS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
We are a team of like-minded professionals from the Marine and Offshore Industry . 


Vision : Harnessing the oceans with oppurtunities they provide in a sustainable environmental friendly and harmonious way by creating value for customers and for the benefit of mankind. 


Services :

Ship design, Shipbuilding, Ship repair, Supervision, Pre-purchase inspection, Pre-charter condition assessments, Drydock  management, Retrofit Consultancy, Offshore platform design, Ocean engineering, Marine warranty surveying.
